definition.para: Collection to which the original resource is a part.

instructions.para: Enter collection name and number, represented as a phrase.
Collection name is the name assigned by the holding repository to the original collection.

customization.para: Enter collection name: "University of Washington Tacoma Oral History: Founding Stories."
Enter collection name and number, represented as a phrase: "KRAB-FM Lesbian-Feminist Radio Program recordings 6115-001."

Where applicable, this value will be entered by University of Washington Libraries Special Collections Staff following transfer of collection resources.
Where a finding aid for an archival collection including the resource exists, the value will be constructed using the collection name and accession number given there.
Record one of the two following values:
Elizabeth Becker Cambodia and Khmer Rouge Collection, 1970-1988
Elizabeth Becker Photographs and Tapes of Cambodia, 1978

history.justification: Special Collections wanted the name of the originl collection represented.

changeLog.change: changed //cdm/required to //cdm/cdmRequired and //cdm/uwRequired to assist in halting use of the cdm "required" feature while, at the same time, indicating that UW-cdm collections must use, or not use, a given property; also changed @xsi:schemaLocation. Also made //uwRequired="yes".
Added a customization for rp standalone instructions.
